text:
Dragon Army | Various Technical Roles | Atlanta, GA | Full-Time / Onsite | http://dragonarmy.com/

Dragon Army is a mobile, web, and digital experience agency based in Atlanta. We have about 40 employees and are looking to grow as we fill out our new office space and take on new client challenges. Big needs right now are for a client-facing software architect, but we are always hiring for Ruby, React, iOS, and Android developers.

Apply via my ref link if desired: https://grnh.se/n85qu71
